body:
When I try to load my stat page, nothing shows up, is there a reason for this? Just a glitch?
What's up.
body_tagged:
When I try to load my stat page, nothing shows up, is there a reason for this? Just a glitch?
What's up.
title: Stats not showing

replies.body:
Fix: http://avicus.net/439109/stats (There is no design)
Why: It is bugged. Ivy is working for a solution, it happens for each player which joined <6.5 months
